= Downloads =

There are a number of ways to acquire the MVPA project code depending on your preferred usage.

The most up to date version will always be the SVN, instruction can be found [http://code.google.com/p/princeton-mvpa-toolbox/source/checkout here].

You can also retrieve the latest version tagged copy of the toolbox [http://www.pni.princeton.edu/mvpa/download.php?action=getinfo here].

Get the papers and abstracts MVPA is based on [http://code.google.com/p/princeton-mvpa-toolbox/downloads/list here].
